courses.title: Communication (Core)
courses.prerequisite: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301. For ENGL 1302, a grade of 'C' or better in ENGL 1301.
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details. Options: ENGL 1301

courses.title: General Biology
courses.notes: Satisfies Major-Specific Requirement. (One hour lab - Integrative & Experiential Learning in the General Education Core)

courses.title: General Chemistry I (Core)
courses.prerequisite: MATH 1314, MATH 1414, MATH 1342, MATH 1343, MATH 2412, MATH 2413 with a grade of 'C' or higher.

courses.title: College Algebra, Precalculus or Calculus I (Core)
courses.prerequisite: MATH 1314/1414: College Ready TSI status in Mathematics; MATH 2412: MATH 1314 or MATH 1414 with a grade of 'C' or better; or MATH 2413: MATH 2412 with a grade of 'C' or better
courses.notes: See General Education Core for more details.
